message_1: In a dictator game, Player A is given $100 to split between themselves and Player B. Player A decides to keep 60% of the money and gives the rest to Player B. How much money did Player B receive?
message_2: Player A keeps 60% of the $100, which is $100 * 0.6 = $60. Since Player A gives the rest to Player B, Player B receives the remaining 40% of the $100. So, Player B gets $100 * 0.4 = $40.
